Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored a goal in the first half, leading Brazil to a 1-0 victory over Ecuador.
Rodrygo's goal was a shot from outside the box that was deflected by a defender to the right post in the 30th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil ended a three-match losing streak in South American qualifying for the 2026 World Cup.
Brazil moved to fourth place in the standings with 10 points.
Ecuador had a five-game unbeaten streak snapped and remained with eight points in sixth place, the last direct qualifying spot from South America for the World Cup.
